subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick and James Blake will again headline the Davis Cup group in singles, and Bob and Mike Bryan, twins ranked No. 1 in the world in doubles, will play the doubles matches.
snippet: Andy Roddick and James Blake will again headline the Davis Cup group in singles, and Bob and Mike Bryan, twins ranked No. 1 in the world in doubles, will play the doubles matches.
